required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: The Tolerability and Pharmacokinetics Study of HEC74647PA Capsule in Healthy Adult Subjects
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase I, Single-center, Randomized，Double-blind, Placebo-controlled, Single & Multiple Ascending Dose Study to Assess the Tolerability and Pharmacokinetics of HEC74647PA Capsule in Healthy Adult Subjects

brief_summary.textblock: The Tolerability and Pharmacokinetics Study of HEC74647PA Capsule in Healthy Adult Subjects

detailed_description.textblock: A Phase I, Single Center, Randomized, Double-blind, Placebo-controlled, Single & Multiple Ascending Dose Study to Access the Tolerability and Pharmacokinetics of HEC74647PA Capsule in Healthy Adult Subjects.

study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)

primary_outcome.measure: Adverse events of the single ascending-dose
primary_outcome.description: To assess the tolerability after a single dose of HEC74647PA capsule

primary_outcome.measure: Adverse events of the multiple ascending-dose
primary_outcome.description: To assess the tolerability after multiple doses of HEC74647PA capsule

primary_outcome.time_frame: Prior to dosing (0 h) and 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 10, 12, 24, 36, 48, 72, 96 and 120 h after dosing
primary_outcome.description: Time of the maximum observed plasma concentration

primary_outcome.time_frame: Prior to dosing (0 h) and 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 10, 12, 24, 36, 48, 72, 96 and 120 h after dosing
primary_outcome.description: Area under the plasma concentration-time curve (AUC)

primary_outcome.time_frame: Prior to dosing (0 h) and 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 10, 12, 24, 36, 48, 72, 96 and 120 h after dosing
primary_outcome.description: Maximum observed plasma concentration of HEC74647

primary_outcome.time_frame: Prior to dosing (0 h) and 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 10, 12, 24, 36, 48, 72, 96 and 120 h after dosing
Prior to dosing (0 h) and 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 10, 12, 24, 36, 48, 72, 96 and 120 h after dosing
Prior to dosing (0 h) and 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 10, 12, 24, 36, 48, 72, 96 and 120 h after dosing
Prior to dosing (0 h) and 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 10, 12, 24, 36, 48, 72, 96 and 120 h after dosing

arm_group.description: It includes two group, one group is pilot study, healthy subjects receive a single dose of 50 mg HEC74647PA capsule (N=2) . Another group is formal study, healthy subjects receive a single dose of 50 mg HEC74647PA capsule (N=8) or matching placebo (N=2).
Healthy subjects, receiving a single dose of 100 mg HEC74647PA capsule (N=8) or matching placebo (N=2).
Healthy subjects, receiving a single dose of 200 mg HEC74647PA capsule (N=16) or matching placebo (N=2) under fed or fasted conditions, this group is a two-sequence, two-period crossover study.
Healthy subjects, receiving a single dose of 400 mg HEC74647PA capsule (N=8) or matching placebo (N=2).
Healthy subjects, receiving a single dose of 600 mg HEC74647PA capsule (N=8) or matching placebo (N=2).
Healthy subjects, receiving a single dose of 800 mg HEC74647PA capsule (N=8) or matching placebo (N=2).
Healthy subjects, receiving 100 mg HEC74647PA capsule (N=10) or placebo(N=2) once daily (q.d.) for 7 days.
Healthy subjects, receiving 200 mg HEC74647PA capsule (N=10) or placebo(N=2) once daily (q.d.) for 7 days.
Healthy subjects, receiving 400 mg HEC74647PA capsule (N=10) or placebo(N=2) once daily (q.d.) for 7 days.

facility.name: The First Hospital of Jilin University
